transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello sir, good morning.
Customer: Ha kon?
Executive: Sir, Praveen bol raha hun IndiaMART se account manager aapka sir.
Customer: Ha ha boliye.
Executive: Ha sir wo lead bheja tha maine aapko.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Thoda dekh leta hun. Dekh lijiye.
Customer: Theek hai. Sir keh raha hun ki ab char din bacha hai sir karwa dijiye.
Customer: Nahi, maine bola na aapko nahi karwana.
Executive: Sir band ho jayega sir kya fayda milega. 84 plus GST 3 saal ke karwa raha hun sir. Jo last minimum dear amount hai wahi hum le sakte hain.
Customer: Last time 80 plus diya tha to bhi nahi liya to aap samajh jaiye na sir.
Executive: Sir 80 plus hum dekho us time char mahina pehle main de raha tha to bhi aapne nahi kiya tha sir.
Customer: Haan to abhi 84 mein kaise le lunga main 80 mein nahi liya to.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: 80 mein nahi liya to 84 mein kaise le lunga?
Executive: Sir 4000 ki baat hai sir. Nahi nahi. Sir agar rehta to dekho sir kya main itne din se aapko ye bolta sir. Ab main bhi to de hi deta main bhi to ek employee hun sir.
Customer: Barabar hai. Theek hai na koi baat nahi. Sir agar fund ka dikat hai to do saal bhi dekh lijiye sir main do saal ke liye aapko try kar leta hun best kya ho payega.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: To teen saal mein hi karoge sir aap?
Customer: Nahi karna hi nahi hai na mujhe.
Executive: Karna hi nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Achcha sir. Sir kyun band karwa rahe hain sir. Itna bharosa rakho sir. Is baar catalog aapka main proper redesigning karwa ke achcha kaam karke dunga sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir itna itna to rakhiye. Maine sir try karke dekh liya na abhi kya hai. Mujhe pata hai kuch fayda hai nahi to phir problem hai phir sir.
Executive: Sir fayda hai nahi agar hoga na to aap bolna sir three to four mahine ka bas mere ko time dena ki.
Customer: Aapko teen char mahine mein dusre department mein dal denge dusra koi aa jayega.
Executive: Sir bilkul nahi aap mail pe mere se likh ke le lijiye sir main hi account. Nahi theek hai jane do uske upar mera control bhi nahi hai. Ha mera mera control isme main lena hai ki nahi lena hai. To main decide kiya hai ki nahi lena hai. Baat khatam hai. Sir aisa mat kijiye dekho aapka achcha khasa visibility hai sir aapke area mein. Theek hai chaliye isse jyada baat nahi kar sakta main. Okay dusra bhi kaam hai.
Executive: Dekh lijiye sir kara lijiye band ho jayega koi fayda nahi hai sir. Nahi theek hai chalega koi dikkat nahi. Four days mein matlab sir. Sir business kar rahe ho sir. Business ke liye hi to jude ho aap sir.
Customer: Chalega sir chalega. kya farak padega.
Executive: Sir dekho band ho jayega theek hai lekin kal ko agar kabhi bhi to online ki aapko jarurat padegi sir aisa to nahi ki IndiaMART hai. Ab market mein Trade India bhi hai Justdial bhi hai sir aur bhi platform hai. But sir jo buyer ka traffic IndiaMART ke pass aata hai na wo kisi other portal pe nahi aata hai. Aur bhi option hai yahi ek hi thodi hai bahut option hai. Sir main wahi to aapse bol raha hun. Aapko agar market mein option hai sir to main to yahi aapko suggest karunga sir har jagah investment kijiye sir kahin na kahin se aapko kuch agar aapke turnover mein badh raha hai sir to aap. Nahi theek hai maine 60 ka 70 kiya tha agar usme possible hai to hi phone kijiye nahi to phone mat kijiye. Bas wo to mera last decision hai.
Executive: 70 plus. Ab aage wahi kitne so baar to bol chuka aapko isse jyada kya bolu main abhi baat bhi karne ka man nahi karta hai.
Executive: Sir dekho aap price ko lekar ke ho sir hota to main karwa deta main kai baar gaya tha sir. Nahi theek hai na aap bhi majbur ho to main bhi majbur hun na main bhi nahi kar sakta usse jyada.
Executive: To sir dekho agar fund ka hai to aap part payment humse le lijiye. Chalo phir se wahi baat karenge kya fayda hai. Ha. Phir se wahi wahi baat karke koi fayda hai kya?
Executive: Sir aap sochiye man jo price sir hai wahi to hum de payenge na. Chalo theek hai main main na aapke iske upar koi jawab dena chahta hun na main apni side se kuch bolna chahta hun. Theek hai jo bhi baat hai ho chuka hai do teen mahine se chal raha hai aapka call. Ha sir agar rehta to main nahi bol deta sir itna main aapko kyun pareshan karta ki sir nahi aapse main thodi jyada aapko bhi samajh gaya na main nahi interested hun. Hmm. Aur amount sir main le bhi lunga na my default kya hoga ki account mein clearance jayega wo turant refund marenge aapka paisa pura return jayega hamare pass double count ho jayega sir. Hmm hmm hmm. Aur meri job ki bhi baat aa jayegi aapne kaise itna renewal mein utha liya. Hmm hmm. Theek hai chalo isse mujhe kya karna hai. Ye to nahi ki main galat aapko feel paisa lekar ke phir aapko. Chalo bas karo call okay. Achcha din lagta hai cut karunga. Karwa lijiye sir. Lead bhej do aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer does not want to renew subscription.

- Executive is trying to convince for renewal.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of renewing subscription.

- Executive offered different subscription plans.

- Customer refused to renew the subscription.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, price, refund
